title: Elegant Mango Maala - Diamond and Gemstone Necklace
materials: Freshwater Pearl drop. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Traditional Mango Maala design, meticulously crafted with alternating mango (Maamidipindi) motifs, each studded with dazzling CZ diamonds. Features a central peacock (Mayura) pendant with an Emerald cabochon and Ruby accents. Delicate pearl drop enhances the necklace's elegance. Intricate filigree work and detailed setting showcases skilled craftsmanship.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. Suitable for both traditional and contemporary ensembles.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship reflecting the heritage of Hyderabad jewelry. High-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and value. The timeless Mango Maala design is a cherished symbol of prosperity and marital bliss. CZ Diamonds provide a brilliant sparkle at an accessible price point. A modern take on a classic design, perfect for the discerning woman.
